name: Ridiculous Parking of Real Racing Rivals Sports Car
name_original: Ridiculous Parking of Real Racing Rivals Sports Car
description:
Ridiculous Parking of Real Racing Rivals Sports Car

This game is the most beautiful and most interesting game where you have to city car parking.

Experience how it feels driving and parking Ridiculous Parking of Real Racing Rivals Sports Car.
It’s quite challenging driving and parking various powerful and adrenaline filled super sports cars. As this real city driver you will get goose bumps every time you hit the gas and make that super engine roar!!

To complete levels, you must pass all the checkpoints and stop into the parking spot. In some levels there are reverse parking spots.

Key features:

=> Realistic Sounds
=> Best Real Crashes
=> Lots of Challenges to Complete
=> Addictive game play
=> Tap on right to take your shift reverse gear
